plot_1a.script_draft:
<script_draft>
<scene_heading>
EXT. MOUNTAIN TRIBE OPEN AREA - DAY
</scene_heading>

<character_performance>
<character>Tyrion Lannister</character>
<performance>Stands in the center, facing a circle of tribal leaders. He is dressed simply but neatly, with his usual calm and wise expression.</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>Tyrion Lannister</character>
<performance>"Honored leaders," he begins, "we have gathered here today because we all face a common enemy—the Lannister army that does not respect our rights and traditions."</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>Grock (Tribal Leader)</character>
<performance>Stands up, the oldest and most respected among the leaders. His voice is deep and powerful, and his gaze is sharp as he looks at Tyrion. "Little demon, why should we trust you?"</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>Tyrion Lannister</character>
<performance>Smiles and responds, "I do not expect you to trust me immediately, but I ask for the chance to prove my sincerity." He then turns to another leader, who has tattoos marking his bravery in battle. "I understand that each tribe has its own unique traditions and customs. I hope to learn from your stories and cultures to find a way forward together."</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>Tribal Leaders</character>
<performance>One by one, they share their tribes' histories, struggles, and hopes for the future. Tyrion listens patiently, nodding in appreciation when hearing about brave warriors and showing sympathy with his eyes for stories of lost loved ones. This genuine attitude gradually earns the respect of everyone present.</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>Tyrion Lannister</character>
<performance>When it's his turn to speak again, he says, "I know that survival on this land is not easy. But if we unite, we can not only protect ourselves from outsiders but also create a better and more peaceful world for our descendants. Please believe me, let us fight side by side!"</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>Tribal Leaders</character>
<performance>The area erupts in applause. After a long discussion, most of the leaders agree to join Tyrion's proposed small coalition and prepare to march towards the Lannister camp. Despite some lingering doubts, Tyrion has successfully taken the first step in forming a new alliance based on mutual understanding and respect.</performance>
</character_performance>
</script_draft>

plot_1b.script_draft:
<script_draft>
<scene_heading>
EXT. 会议地点 - 开阔的空地 - DAY
</scene_heading>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂·兰尼斯特</character>
<performance>站在中央，面对着围坐成一圈的部落首领们。他穿着简单却整洁的衣服，脸上带着一贯的冷静与智慧。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂·兰尼斯特</character>
<performance>“尊敬的各位首领，” 提利昂开始了他的讲话，“我们今天聚集在这里，是因为我们都面临着共同的敌人——那些不尊重我们的权利和传统的兰尼斯特军队。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>马尔科</character>
<performance>站起来，他是这里最年轻也最强硬的一位。“提利昂·兰尼斯特，你凭什么认为你能赢得我的信任？” 马尔科的声音充满了愤怒，目光中闪烁着仇恨的光芒。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂·兰尼斯特</character>
<performance>微微一笑，平静地说：“我并没有期望你立刻信任我，但我请求你给我一个机会来证明我的诚意。” 他顿了顿，继续说道：“我知道兰尼斯特家族曾经杀害了你的亲人，我对你的痛苦感同身受。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>马尔科</character>
<performance>眼神变得更加锐利，紧握拳头，咬牙切齿地说：“你说得轻巧！你知道失去亲人的痛苦吗？”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂·兰尼斯特</character>
<performance>点了点头，眼神中流露出一丝悲伤：“我确实知道那种痛苦。在我的家族中，我也遭受过许多不公待遇。我被贬低、嘲笑，甚至差点被处死。但正是这些经历让我更加坚定地要改变现状，让那些伤害过我们的人付出代价。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>马尔科</character>
<performance>眼神稍微缓和了一些，但仍保持着警惕：“你怎么保证你能帮助我们复仇？”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂·兰尼斯特</character>
<performance>深吸一口气，坚定地说：“我可以提供情报、策略和资源。更重要的是，我会亲自参与战斗，与你们并肩作战。我们一起打败兰尼斯特军队，为你的亲人报仇。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>马尔科</character>
<performance>沉默了一会儿，内心的挣扎显而易见。最终，他缓缓点头，声音低沉地说：“好吧，小恶魔，我相信你一次。如果你敢背叛我们，后果自负。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂·兰尼斯特</character>
<performance>伸出手，马尔科犹豫了一下，然后紧紧握住提利昂的手。这一刻，两人的目光交汇，彼此间建立了一种新的默契。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>其他部落首领</character>
<performance>纷纷表达了对这个新联盟的支持。尽管仍有些许疑虑存在，但提利昂已经成功迈出了第一步，建立了一个基于相互理解和尊重的新联盟。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂·兰尼斯特, 马尔科</character>
<performance>详细讨论了行动计划，并确保每一个细节都得到充分考虑。他们准备向兰尼斯特军营进发，心中充满了决心和希望。</performance>
</character_performance>
</script_draft>

<character_performance>
<character>野兽</character>
<performance>野兽咆哮着冲向提利昂。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>提利昂反应极快，灵活地闪避并挥剑刺向野兽的腹部。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>格罗克和马尔科</character>
<performance>格罗克和马尔科各自带领队伍从两侧夹击野兽。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>战士们</character>
<performance>经过一番激烈的战斗，终于将野兽击退。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>提利昂检查了几名受伤的战士，确保他们都得到了妥善的治疗。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>提利昂走到格罗克和马尔科面前，感激地说：“多亏了你们的英勇，我们才能幸免于难。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>格罗克</character>
<performance>格罗克指责马尔科在战斗中的某个决策失误。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>马尔科</character>
<performance>马尔科反驳说格罗克没有听从指挥。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>提利昂走上前去，冷静地说：“现在不是争论的时候。我们都清楚，只有团结一致，我们才能战胜共同的敌人。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>提利昂转向格罗克：“格罗克，你的经验对我们来说非常宝贵，但有时候也需要听听年轻人的意见。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>提利昂接着对马尔科说：“马尔科，你的勇气和力量让我们都感到钦佩，但也要学会尊重前辈的经验。我们每个人都有长处，也有不足，只有相互信任和支持，才能走得更远。”</performance>

<character_performance>
<character>格罗克和马尔科</character>

<character>战士们</character>

plot_2b.script_draft:

EXT. FOREST - DAY
</scene_heading>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>提利昂带领他的部队穿过茂密的森林。阳光透过树梢洒下斑驳的光影，鸟鸣声此起彼伏。</performance>
</character_performance>
<scene_heading>
EXT. RIVERBANK - DAY

<character>提利昂</character>

<character_performance>
<character>敌人巡逻队</character>

<character>提利昂</character>

</character_performance>

plot_3a.script_draft:
<script_draft>
<scene_heading>
EXT. 军营外的隐蔽观察点 - 夜
</scene_heading>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>与山地部落的战士们来到军营附近的隐蔽观察点，俯瞰着远处灯火通明的军营。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>侦察员们</character>

<character>提利昂</character>

</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>一名侦察员</character>
<performance>走上前来，低声汇报：“敌军的防御非常严密，四周都有巡逻队来回巡视。而且，他们的武器和装备看起来都很精良。”</performance>

<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>点了点头，心中迅速盘算起来。转向身旁的几位首领，说道：“我们需要一个详细的计划来应对即将到来的冲突。我们必须充分利用我们的人数优势和地形优势。”</performance>

<character_performance>
<character>格罗克</character>

<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>

<character_performance>
<character>马尔科</character>

<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>继续说道：“信任与合作是我们成功的关键。我们每个人都要相信自己的同伴，并且密切配合。只有这样，我们才能战胜强大的敌人。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>格罗克和马尔科</character>

</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>格罗克</character>
<performance>坚定地说：“我们会听从你的指挥。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>马尔科</character>
<performance>点头附和：“是的，小恶魔，我们一起战斗到底。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>微微一笑，心中感到一丝温暖。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂和他的部队</character>
<performance>开始为即将到来的战斗做最后的准备。他们检查了武器，确认了路线，并制定了详细的行动计划。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>提利昂</character>
<performance>带领他的部队悄然离开隐蔽点，向着兰尼斯特军营进发。他们的心中充满了决心和信念，为了共同的目标而战。</performance>
</character_performance>
</script_draft>
